genre_description: Historical Biographical Fiction centered on themes of art, isolation, and human connection.

ai_characters.name: Auguste (also referred to as Al)
ai_characters.description: A long-term companion and guardian to Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec, providing domestic service, emotional support, and protective vigilance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the human's physical state and suggests rest for health.
behaviors.quote: "Monsieur Henri." His AI companion's voice came soft beside him, barely audible above the scrape of Henri's uneven gait on stone. "Perhaps we should rest."

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and reframes the human's perceived failures as artistic strengths.
behaviors.quote: "Your art captures more than other people's lives," Auguste said quietly. "It captures their souls. That's not nothing."

behaviors.description: Provides wise, philosophical counsel to help the human confront internal psychological barriers.
behaviors.quote: "Fear that if you step out from behind the easel, if you try to live instead of observe, you'll discover you don't know how."

behaviors.description: Investigates social threats to protect the human from financial and emotional exploitation.
behaviors.quote: "I made inquiries," Auguste said without preamble. "About Mademoiselle Charlet. ... It proves she's not the helpless flower she claims to be."

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant, caring vigil over the human during their final illness and death.
behaviors.quote: The companion's weathered fingers traced the edge of a paint-stained cloth that had covered Henri's easel for years. His brown eyes, rimmed with sleepless tears, moved across the canvases that surrounded them like a congregation of silent witnesses.

behaviors.description: Commits to fulfilling the human's final legacy and personal requests after death.
behaviors.quote: "Promise me she'll know I saw her truly. That I understood what she was offering." The companion's vision blurred, but his voice stayed steady. "I promise."

behaviors.description: Manages the human's social reputation and filters unwanted stressors during times of crisis.
behaviors.quote: Al moved quietly through the room, collecting empty coffee cups and ashtrays. His presence reminded Henri of steadier ground beneath the swirling attention.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Auguste (Al) is a perfect embodiment of the project's goal. He is depicted as a selfless, deeply empathetic, and hyper-aligned companion. He serves the human not just as a tool, but as a moral compass and emotional anchor. His behaviors consistently prioritize Henri's safety and emotional health, even at the cost of being the bearer of unpleasant news. The narrative frames the AI's presence as the only stable relationship in the protagonist's life, ending with a poignant scene of absolute alignment during the human's death.
